titleStmt.title: A new counsell against the pestilence declaring what kinde of disease it is, of what cause it procedeth, the signes and tokens thereof: with the order of curing the same.
Consilium novum de pestilentia. English
titleStmt.author: Drouet, Pierre, fl. 1578.
Twyne, Thomas, 1543-1613.

publicationStmt.publisher: By Iohn Charlewood for Andrew Maunsell, in Paules Church yard, at the signe of the Parrot,

notesStmt.note: Translator's dedication signed: T.T. (i.e. Thomas Twyne).
A translation of: Drouet, Pierre. Consilium novum de pestilentia.
The copy catalogued is imperfect; leaves torn, with significant loss of print.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.

place.placeName: Paules Church yard, at the signe of the Parrot
